title: Leading eSports games worldwide 2019 , by tournament prize pool
yAxis: Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Game Name in the x axis and Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars 64.37 is found at Game Name Fortnite and the minimum is found at Rainbow Six Siege where Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars is 3.88.
There is a difference of 60.49 between the maximum Game Name Fortnite and minimum Game Name Rainbow Six Siege.
